function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aerosol transmission in enclosed spaces may occur due to COVID-19, leading to increased risk of transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and potential spread of the disease in confined spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing improved ventilation systems and modification to existing systems to reduce the concentration of aerosols in indoor spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation, high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, and increased outdoor air exchange.","People":"Individuals living in enclosed spaces, especially those in densely populated areas or shared living spaces.","Owner":"Property managers, building owners, and occupants."}]}
